code: import Platform from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Platform";import StyleSheet from"react-native-web/dist/exports/StyleSheet";import Colors from"./Colors";import{Fonts}from"../assets";import{moderateScale}from"./Metrics";var styling=function styling(theme){return StyleSheet.create({screen:{flex:1,backgroundColor:Colors[theme].white},activityHeaderStyle:{backgroundColor:Colors[theme].screenBackground},activityTabLable:{fontSize:Platform.OS==="web"?14:moderateScale(14),fontFamily:Fonts.regular}});};export default styling;
